Levels.cue: Screen displays the name of the upcoming video
Levels.video: Video playback. Refer to csv data files for the name of each video
Levels.full: Post-video fixation period, after a Full-length video
Levels.interrupted: Post-video fixation period, after an Interrupted video
Levels.exclude_cue: Same as cue but for an excluded trial
Levels.exclude_video: Same as video but for an excluded trial
Levels.exclude_fix: Post-video fixation period for an excluded trial
